heading: HR01276
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS HERE AND THROUGH OUR DIPLOMATIC REPRESENTATION IN CYPRUS, OUR SOCIAL SECURITY SERVICES, AND THE SECRETARY OF THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT WHO SITS IN THE SSS BOARD, TO RESPECTIVELY SUBMIT A REPORT ON THE REASON FOR THEIR INACTION ON THE 7-YEAR OLD PETITION OF OFWS IN CYPRUS TO INITIATE THE FORGING OF A BILATERAL SOCIAL SECURITY AGREEMENT BETWEEN THE GOVERNMENTS OF THE PHILIPPINES AND CYPRUS, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF FINALLY GETTING THE DESIRED AGREEMENT SOONEST, AND IN AID OF LEGISLATION
status: Pending with the Committee on OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS since 2018-01-31
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01276
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE DEPARTMENT OF FOREIGN AFFAIRS HERE AND THROUGH OUR DIPLOMATIC REPRESENTATION IN CYPRUS, OUR SOCIAL SECURITY SERVICES, AND THE SECRETARY OF THE DEPARTMENT OF LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT WHO SITS IN THE SSS BOARD, TO RESPECTIVELY SUBMIT A REPORT ON THE REASON FOR THEIR INACTION ON THE 7-YEAR OLD PETITION OF OFWS IN CYPRUS TO INITIATE THE FORGING OF A BILATERAL SOCIAL SECURITY AGREEMENT BETWEEN THE GOVERNMENTS OF THE PHILIPPINES AND CYPRUS, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF FINALLY GETTING THE DESIRED AGREEMENT SOONEST, AND IN AID OF LEGISLATION
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : BERTIZ, ANICETO "JOHN" III D.
DATE FILED : 2017-09-04
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON OVERSEAS WORKERS AFFAIRS ON 2018-01-31
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO RULES on 2017-09-05;
